attributes.action: Install pedestrian crossings at the Mossley Road/Queens Road Crossroads, Ashton
attributes.additional_details: I have seen several people struggle to cross and I have almost been knocked over several times
attributes.background: This crossing is dangerous. There is a blind corner on one of the junctions so it is dangerous to cross as a pedestrian not to mention with a pram/wheelchair or as an elderly person. I've contacted the council but they sent the sequence for light changes. Simply put this crossing is currently unsafe

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
